<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script applies for Utah upgrade. 
Set width and height fields to 'Large' when record target equals 'Popup' and width and height are empty.</description>
        <name>Target Location Fix Script</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var smartLinkGr = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_smart_link");
smartLinkGr.addQuery("target", "Popup");
smartLinkGr.addQuery("width", "");
smartLinkGr.addQuery("height", "");
smartLinkGr.query();
	
while(smartLinkGr.next()) {
	smartLinkGr.setValue('width', "large");
	smartLinkGr.setValue('height', "large");
	smartLinkGr.update();
}

gs.info("Successfully executed Target Location Fix Script");]]></script>
